Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. After careful consideration, I propose a special introductory price of $13500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its high value but also my desire to ensure it meets your expectations and needs effectively. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
